title: Zoraptera Occurrence Dataset
description: The curated dataset of Zoraptera occurrences described in the paper. The dataset is stored in zoraptera.csv file, its based on Darwin Core standard, and is updated manually or by semi-automated workflow described below.
notes:
This MIT licence apply on repository excluding single data records in the dataset. The license for each entry (if applicable) is listed in column licence of the dataset and may be incompatible with MIT.
This research was supported by the Grant Agency of the Czech Republic (project No. 22-05024S; Evolution of angel insects (Zoraptera): from fossils and comparative morphology to cytogenetics and transcriptomes).
